product_name: Asolo Agent Gv Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: The waterproof Asolo Agent Gv Hiking Shoes offer underfoot protection and a comfortable ergonomic fit so you can enjoy day hikes even on muddy trails. Water-resistant suede uppers are lined with GORE-TEX(R) waterproof, breathable membranes to keep your feet dry when you're stepping through puddles. EVA midsoles provide cushioning. Asolo Agent Gv Hiking Shoes have Vibram(R) rubber outsoles that provide sure-footed traction on hiking trails.
short_description: The waterproof Asolo Agent Gv Hiking Shoes offer underfoot protection and a comfortable ergonomic fit so you can enjoy day hikes even on muddy trails.
